name: Pick My Luggage
description:
Welcome!

Pick My Luggage is a game that has a fun take on the infamous Tower Defense genre.

You are in charge of the luggage delivery for the airport. Help people get their luggage by building pick up machines. Otherwise, the luggages might get destroyed!

Controls:

  • WASD to move camera
  • Q/E to rotate camera (not polished)
  • Mousewheel to zoom
  • Left click a machine/car to select
  • Right click to deselect
  • Click on machine base slots to build.
  • Click on machines to upgrade

Pick My Luggage was developed for the Community Game Jam 2019 in 1 week.

Credits:
